    • registerTournament

      public boolean registerTournament(String startDate, String endDate)
      Description: The registerTournament method is responsible for registering the start and end date of the tournament. pre: startDate must be declared. pre: endDate must be declared. pos: the start date of the tournament is registered. pos: the end date of the tournament is registered. pos: the groups are initialized. pos: the data is preloaded. pos: true is returned if the tournament is registered successfully. pos: false is returned if the start date is after the end date or the duration is less than one month.
      Parameters:
      startDate - , String with the start date of the tournament.
      endDate - , String with the end date of the tournament.
      Returns:
      boolean, true if the tournament is registered successfully, false if the start date is after the end date or the duration is less than one month.

    • registerTeam

      public boolean registerTeam(String name, String country, String nameTechnicalDirector)
      Description: The registerTeam method is responsible for registering a team in the tournament. pre: groupA must be initialized. pre: groupB must be initialized. pos: true is returned if the team is registered successfully. pos: false is returned if both groups are full.
      Parameters:
      name - , String with the name of the team.
      country - , String with the country of the team.
      nameTechnicalDirector - , String with the name of the technical director of the team.
      Returns:
      boolean, true if the team is registered successfully, false if both groups are full.

    • registerPlayer

      public boolean registerPlayer(int shirtNumber, String teamName, String playerName, String country, String position)
      Description: The registerPlayer method is responsible for registering a player in a team of the tournament. pre: groupA must be initialized. pre: groupB must be initialized. pos: true is returned if the player is registered successfully. pos: false is returned if the team is not found.
      Parameters:
      shirtNumber - , int with the shirt number of the player.
      teamName - , String with the name of the team.
      playerName - , String with the name of the player.
      country - , String with the country of the player.
      position - , String with the position of the player.
      Returns:
      boolean, true if the player is registered successfully, false if the team is not found.

    • registerReferee

      public boolean registerReferee(String id, String name, String country, String type)
      Description: The registerReferee method is responsible for registering a referee in the tournament. pre: referees must be initialized. pos: true is returned if the referee is registered successfully. pos: false is returned if the country is not valid, the type is not valid or the referee already exists.
      Parameters:
      id - , String with the id of the referee.
      name - , String with the name of the referee.
      country - , String with the country of the referee.
      type - , String with the type of the referee.
      Returns:
      boolean, true if the referee is registered successfully, false if the country is not valid, the type is not valid or the referee already exists.

    • assignRefereeToMatch

      public boolean assignRefereeToMatch(String refereeId, String teamName1, String teamName2)
      Description: The assignRefereeToMatch method is responsible for assigning a referee to a match of the tournament. pre: referees must be initialized. pre: groupA must be initialized. pre: groupB must be initialized. pos: true is returned if the referee is assigned to the match successfully. pos: false is returned if the referee is not found, the match is not found or the referee is from the same country as either team.
      Parameters:
      refereeId - , String with the id of the referee.
      teamName1 - , String with the name of the first team.
      teamName2 - , String with the name of the second team.
      Returns:
      boolean, true if the referee is assigned to the match successfully, false if the referee is not found, the match is not found or the referee is from the same country as either team.

    • registerResult

      public boolean registerResult(String teamName1, String teamName2, int team1Goals, int team2Goals)
      Description: The registerResult method is responsible for registering the result of a match of the tournament. pre: groupA must be initialized. pre: groupB must be initialized. pos: true is returned if the result of the match is registered successfully. pos: false is returned if the match is not found.
      Parameters:
      teamName1 - , String with the name of the first team.
      teamName2 - , String with the name of the second team.
      team1Goals - , int with the goals of the first team.
      team2Goals - , int with the goals of the second team.
      Returns:
      boolean, true if the result of the match is registered successfully, false if the match is not found.
